definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
appellee (side that won in trial court, whose victory is being appealed by losing side)

sentences.english: Singleton's counsel said after the trial that he would appeal.
sentences.chinese: 審判結束後，辛格爾頓的律師表示他將會上訴。

sentences.english: It also covers in detail state appellate decisions construing the policy provisions.
sentences.chinese: 還包括詳細的解釋政策條款的州上訴決議。
穆薩維和雷扎伊昨天提出上訴。

sentences.english: It was not immediately clear if Li would appeal the charge.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚不清楚李是否會上訴。

sentences.english: I heard that the appeal was heard in private.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說這件上訴案沒有公開審理。

sentences.english: The sentence of the court was quashed on appeal.
sentences.chinese: 經過上訴，法院的判決被宣佈無效。

sentences.english: The right of appeal is an important part of good law.
sentences.chinese: 上訴權是良法的重要一環。

sentences.english: She appealed to a higher court.
Fort Worth has countered with a lawsuit, which is pending in the U.S. Court of Appeals.
sentences.chinese: 因此沃思堡將面臨聯邦上訴法院的控訴。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court did not hand down a sentence, but ordered the Appeals Court to re-examine the case.
sentences.chinese: 但最高法院沒有宣佈判決，而是責令上訴庭複議此案。

sentences.english: She was nominated for an appeals court judgeship in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 她在一九九九年被提名上訴法院法官的職位。

sentences.english: The relation between the remand for new trial and the principle of no appeal resulting in additional punishment is seldom discussed before.
sentences.chinese: 發回重審和上訴不加刑原則的關係問題很少有人論及。

sentences.english: The plaintiff battled the decision all the way to the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 原告不服這項判決，上訴直到最高法院。

sentences.english: Juventus have decided to lodge an appeal against the three-match ban handed out to David Trezeguet.
sentences.chinese: 尤文圖斯爲特雷澤蓋停賽三場提出了上訴。

sentences.english: Premium leather upper features faux laces grown-up appeal.
sentences.chinese: 高級人造皮革鞋面功能鞋帶長大了上訴。

sentences.english: The High Court shall comprise the Court of Appeal and the Court of First Instance.
sentences.chinese: 高等法院設上訴法庭和原訟法庭。

definition: judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
to make a formal request/formal request/to make a claim (law)
to demand payment of money owing
to counter accusations/to protest/to remonstrate/to retort/to plead/to demur/a plea (of not guilty)/a defense (against an allegation)/to enter a plea to a charge (in a law court)
